creator: an@Genetik.Uni-Bielefeld.DE
text:
There seems to be a problem spawning the log commands under Solaris 9. 
If apache is stopped, a signal is send to the log command, but the log command  
restarts. Because httpd is stopped, the log command's parent is init (pid 1), 
and the program never stops... 
This error doesn't occur with httpd-2.0.44 under Solaris 9 and doesn't occur 
with httpd-2.0.45 under Solaris 8. 
I only noticed this error with httpd-2.0.45 under Solaris 9.
